actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To require the Secretary of Transportation to request the National Academy of Sciences to report to the Secretary and the Congress regarding the use of, and risks associated with, electronic and microprocessor systems in automobiles.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to enter into arrangements with the National Academy of Sciences to conduct a comprehensive study regarding the use of electronic and microprocessor systems in automobiles and the safety risks associated with such use. Directs the Secretary to ask the Academy to report to the Secretary and the Congress by one year after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Transportation to request the National Academy of Sciences to report to the Secretary and the Congress regarding the use of, and risks associated with, electronic and microprocessor systems in automobiles.
